content: crocheted holiday ornaments an assortment for holiday decorating angel christmas flower wreath tasseled diamond skill level easy-intermediate size 2-1/2 to 4 high materials note sample thread ornaments shown in coats & clark knit-cro-sheen sample yarn ornaments shown in plymouth yarns encore small amounts of sport or dk-wt yarn in red green white 1 ball size 10 crochet thread in gold with gold metallic accent 1 ball size 10 crochet thread in white with silver metallic accent one 1 cabone ring for wreath 2 small jingle bells 5 tiny red pompoms 4 small red faceted beads for trims crochet hooks sizes d/3 3 25 mm e/4 3 5 mm f/5 3 75 mm 1 tapestry needle gauge not critical for this project stitches/terms beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet repeat repeat round round single_crochet single_crochet triple crochet treble_crochet stitch st pattern notes angel and tasseled diamond ornaments are worked with 2 strands #10 crochet cotton thread held together as one christmas flower and wreath are worked in single strand of yarn angel ornament use double strand white/silver metallic crochet cotton & size e/4 3 5 mm hook head & wings round 1 chain 4 join into ring work 11 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next 2 double_crochet chain 12 halo skip 3 double_crochet single_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch 10 single_crochet + chain-12 halo turn and work in row for remainder of ornament row 3 chain 3 5 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 10 double_crochet 6 double_crochet in top of last st the beginning chain-3 turn 22 double_crochet row 4 chain 3 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet all in same st as beg chain-3 single_crochet in next 20 double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet 2dc all in top of last st top of beg chain-3 fasten_off 28 sts head & wings completed skirt turn head/wings piece upside down row 1 reattach yarn in 11th single_crochet from tip of wing ch3 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in ea of next 6
